metadata.title: CVE-2022-1144 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in WebUI in Google Chrome prior to 100.0.4896.60 allowed aremote attacker who convinced a user to engage in specific user interactionto potentially exploit heap corruption via specific input into DevTools.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
